item.title: Nginx+PHP编译安装
item.description: 编译安装Nginx&PHP nginx编译安装 下载路径：(建议使用Tengine) http://nginx.org/ http://tengine.taobao.org/ 启动命令 /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx 重载nginx /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx -s reload 一、安装环境 sudo yum groupinstall "Development Tools" -y sudo yum install jemalloc-devel openssl-devel pcre-devel -y nginx编译参数(红色部分可能不支持,可去掉) # sudo ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/nginx --user=webapps --group=webapps --with-http_stub_status_module --with-http_ssl_module --with-http_gzip_static_module --with-pcre --with-jemalloc # sudo make # sudo make install # cd /usr/local/nginx # sudo mv logs /export/ # sudo ln -s /export/logs logs # cd /usr/local/nginx/conf # sudo mkdir vhosts 二、修改conf文件 1. 修改主nginx.conf 1-1.
